channel.title: How to install the Frappe Lending app locally (no README available)
channel.description: The Frappe Lending GitHub repository currently does not include a README file, which makes it unclear how to install and set up the app locally. This post explains the **step-by-step process to install the Frappe Lending app on a local Frappe/Bench setup**.

item.title: How to install the Frappe Lending app locally (no README available)
item.dc:creator: asieftejani
item.description:
Otherwise if you want to learn the docker way use easy-install.py at Creating new custom app in the dockerized instance is not possible · Issue #1640 · frappe/frappe_docker · GitHub

Read full topic
item.source: How to install the Frappe Lending app locally (no README available)

item.title: How to install the Frappe Lending app locally (no README available)
item.dc:creator: Omar-Abdullah
item.description:
Like any app, just do

bench get-app lending

then install it on the desired site (local.site is just an example of site name):

bench --site local.site install-app lending

then migrate that site:

bench --site local.site migrate

Read full topic
